name: Introduction to Gender & Sexuality Studies
description: This course is an introduction to Gender & Sexuality Studies, focusing on topics such as the history of gender and sexual identity, gender roles and expectations, and the impacts of gender and sexuality on society and culture.

name: Theories of Gender & Sexuality
description: This course focuses on the development of feminist and queer theories, including historical and contemporary theories, and their impact on gender and sexual identities.

name: Intersex Studies
description: This course focuses on the study of intersex identities, including history, medicalization, and the impact of intersex identities on society.
